definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical application of keyhole craniotomy microsurgery in neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鎖孔入路顯微手術在神經外科的應用。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the utility of EC glue in neurosurgical operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討EC膠在神經外科各類手術中的應用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the role of communicative theory patterns with aphasia patients in neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討溝通理論在神經外科失語病人中的運用價值。

sentences.english: The sitting position is most often used for neurosurgical procedures, especially in the posterior fossa.
sentences.chinese: 坐位手術通常用於神經外科手術，特別是顱後窩手術。

sentences.english: An extensive sacrococcygeal chordoma is considered a challenge for neurosurgeons.
sentences.chinese: 廣泛性骶尾椎脊索瘤被認爲是神經外科的挑戰。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the application of neuronavigation in keyhole surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討神經導航技術在神經外科鎖孔手術中的應用。

sentences.english: We are marked leader in neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 我們在神經外科領域處於顯著領先地位。

sentences.english: Objective To provide the anatomical data of cerebellar arteries for neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲神經外科提供小腦動脈的臨牀解剖學資料。

sentences.english: The chances of Linda becoming a neurosurgeon are about one in a googol.
sentences.chinese: 琳達要當神經外科醫生可真是希望渺茫。

sentences.english: People who have recently had neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 誰最近在神經外科的人。

sentences.english: When I said neurosurgeon, he wouldn't believe me.
sentences.chinese: 我說我是神經外科醫生，那個人竟然不相信。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the application of mobile CT in neurosurgical operations.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討移動式CT在神經外科手術中的應用價值。

sentences.english: Objective To provide the microanatomy of sellar region for the clinical neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲臨牀神經外科提供鞍區顯微解剖和解剖參數。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a neurosurgery device, comprising a latex saccule and a working pipe.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及神經外科手術器材。

to help a mother give birth
